resources.string: Each item is a pay once unlimited use item.
Button to buy the no-ads feature.
Button to navigate to the settings screen.
Button to bookmark the current story.
Button to navigate to the shop screen.
Button to navigate to the credits screen.
You do not have any bookmarks. To add a bookmark, press the bookmark button on the top left corner of any story page.
Button to navigate to the settings screen.
Button to navigate to the help screen.

Browse Files - Navigate through the stories.

Bookmarks - You can set bookmarks while reading a story for easy access in the future. Bookmark a story by pressing the bookmark button on the top left of the story screen.

Settings - Configure story text size, visit the shop, or view production credits.

Help - View this help screen.
